name: USURPER'S NECROMANCER DESTROYED
text:
MAGES GUILD DESTROYS NECROMANCER IN AYLEID RUIN

Guildmaster Tisia and %PCName of the Anvil Mages Guild have received an official commendation from the Queen of Anvil for a recent operation to destroy Edroth, a long-concealed necromancer general of the Camoran Usurper. The infamous necromancer, who disappeared in the chaotic years after the reconquest of Anvil, was thought dead for over a century before the Guild found him in the depths of Valsar, a ruined Ayleid citadel in the Strident Coast region.

Edroth had assembled an army of reanimated undead in his lair, and was no doubt plotting some grievous new attack on the people of the Kingdom of Anvil. The Monitor joins the Queen in thanking the Mages Guild for their efforts to protect the public and stamp out those who abuse magic wherever they are found.
